sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Will is walking back towards his home, but he suddenly stops and looks at the sky. The sky was cloudy and empty without any stars.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: The moon was hidden by the cloud, it seems as if the sky is mirroring what he feels at the moment.

sentences.name: Will
sentences.sentence: I donâ€™t want to go home...

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: Will can only keep himself sane when he is working, because he can forget a lot of things when he drowns himself with work.

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: Whenever he is not working, all the bottled emotion comes rushing back to him. Everything feels different ever since Anna left him.

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: The night was going on as usual, even if Will did not want the time to move. People went by, shopped, talked , just continuing on with their normal routine.

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: Only Will was staying still in the street as if he was an empty shell. After a while, Will finally continued walking towards his apartment.
